participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly, adventurous, and caring. Enjoys helping others and loves nature.
participant_1.background: I like to shop at goodwill. I like to be outdoors. I'm from California. I'm a student. I think recycling is important.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and resourceful, enjoys spending time with family and learning new skills.
participant_2.background: I live with my paps and grandma. Paps likes to go mushroom hunting. I have a brown belt in karate. Grandma makes jewelry.

content.text: Hi! What's your name?
My name is participant_2.
It's nice to meet you, participant_1.
It's nice to meet you too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking and camping. I also like to go fishing.
That sounds like fun! I like to go hiking and camping too. I also like to go swimming.
Where are you from?
I'm from California.
Oh, I've always wanted to go to California. I hear it's beautiful.
It is! I love the beaches and the mountains.
I'm sure I would too.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a student. I'm studying to be a teacher.
That's great! I'm a student too. I'm studying to be a social worker.
Oh, that's cool! I've always thought about being a social worker.
It's a great job. I'm really excited about it.
I'm sure you'll be a great social worker.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I like to read, watch movies, and play video games.
Me too! I love to read and watch movies. I don't play video games very often, but I like them.
That's cool. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read everything, but I especially like romance novels, mystery novels, and historical fiction.
Oh, I like those too! I love romance novels and mystery novels. I'm not a big fan of historical fiction, but I'll read it if it's good.
I think you would like historical fiction if you gave it a try. There are some really great historical fiction novels out there.
Maybe I will. I'll have to check some out.
I'm sure you'd like them.
